list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a knot tied with two loops and two loose ends, used especially for tying shoelaces and decorative ribbons.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a girl with long hair tied back in a bow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một cô gái với mái tóc dài buộc lại trong một cây cung

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a weapon for shooting arrows, typically made of a curved piece of wood whose ends are joined by a taut string.
a long, partially curved rod with horsehair stretched along its length, used for playing the violin and other stringed instruments.
a curved stroke forming part of a letter (e.g. b, p ).
a metal ring forming the handle of a key or pair of scissors.
an act of bending the head or upper body as a sign of respect or greeting.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the man gave a little bow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người đàn ông cung cấp một con nơ nhỏ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the front end of a ship.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: water sprayed high over her bows
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nước phun cao trên cung của cô

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: play (a stringed instrument or music) using a bow.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the techniques by which the pieces were bowed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: các kỹ thuật mà các mảnh được chèo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bend the head or upper part of the body as a sign of respect, greeting, or shame.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he turned and bowed to his father
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh quay lại và cúi đầu chào cha mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bend with age or under pressure.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the tree next to the house bowed in the wind
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cây bên cạnh ngôi nhà cúi đầu trong gió
